title: Multiple ults instead of new champion release
body:
What if a champion had "X" amount of ults and you had to pick the one you wanna play during champion select?
There are just so many champs to master and having more ults will add fun to your favorite champs. Plus, more skins!

Imagine Teemo setting traps that would launch you in the air if you step on them or make you hallucinate and you see 3 teemos, F!
Fizz surfing his shark 
Ekko jumping to the "Future" however that would look like...
Lee's upercut
Shyvana's wrath (MF's ult like)
Udyr Wolf stand (fear?) or Snake (hook?)'
...

What are your favorite champs? What do their new ults would look like?

replies.body: I don't even understand what question you're trying to ask.
Adding more depth and customisation to champions would be cool, though I'd still want to see new champions as well. :P
